posts.description: 4chan is running out of money—and Martin Shkreli wants to help out | Ars Technica
posts.extended: 4chan, the infamous message board whose users once labelled it "the asshole of the Internet," is nearly out of money and will have to take drastic action if it wants to survive, according to its new owner. Meanwhile, the notorious hedge fund manager Martin Shkreli has offered to help out.

posts.description: Smashed Windows, Social Media and State Surveillance
posts.extended: On September 21st, 2016 the people of Charlotte, North Carolina took the streets in response to the police murder of Keith Lamont Scott, a 30 year old black man fatally shot by two undercover officers serving someone else a warrant.
